title: About Me
name: Ran Wright
description: I specialize in AIOps, MLOps, and architecting scalable AI and data platforms. Passionate about transforming complex challenges into innovative solutions.
expertise: AIOps & MLOps – Implementing operational strategies to enhance AI workflows.
Data Platform Architecture – Designing robust data infrastructures for efficient processing.
Low Latency Systems – Ensuring minimal latency and high throughput in real-time data.

projects.title: LLM Logic Lab
projects.description: Explored logical reasoning capabilities of LLMs, developing a Python-based framework to assess various models.

projects.title: Scaling API Requests
projects.description: Analyzed and implemented caching strategies for 1.2 billion daily API requests, achieving low latency & high throughput.

philosophy: My approach centers on transparency, collaboration, and excellence. I strive to bridge the gap between complex data systems and actionable business insights.
